name: Vizier Ovelis
aura: Increase Ally ATK in Dungeons by 34

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times.

Each hit has a 35% chance of increasing the duration of all debuffs by 1 turn.
skills.name: Accursed Blades
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.

Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff, and a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Master of Misery
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy.

Applies a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 2 random debuffs from the target and placing them on all enemies.

Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 3 turns if the target is under 2 or more debuffs.
skills.name: Vizier of Poisons

skills.desc: Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns at the start of each Round.
